description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow reorientation of half-pitched roof, adjustment of height of ground floor rear extension, and a window insertion opening to the ground floor side elevation in relation to planning permission reference  233293HH dated 05/10/2023 for 'Single storey rear infill extension  following demolition of existing conservatory; alterations to the ground floor rear elevation involving the insertion of a new opening; creation of a raised  patio/terrace to the rear; provision of refuse storage.'
decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 233293HH dated 05/10/2023 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
